original_text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves, Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing? behold, the world is gone after him.
korean_text: 바리새인들이 서로 말하되 볼지어다 너희 하는 일이 쓸 데 없다 보라 온 세상이 그를 따르는도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves
Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 아무것도 이루지 못하는 것을 보지 못하느냐?

sentences.original_text: behold, the world is gone after him.
